text: we are natural-born scientists in my
view is that we actually all start off
as scientists so when parents ask me hey
how do I get my kid interested in
science I'm like your kid already is
interested in science when your kid is
is smashing things together and and
ripping things apart what they're doing
is they're trying to figure out what
it's made of how it works what's going
on inside and that's what scientific
curiosity is all about so to me the most
important advice to a parent wants their
kid to carry on in science is get out of
the way let them do that
exploration don't shut them down right I
mean everybody wants to protect their
house and their belongings I get that
right I'm the same way at some level but
in the end of the day you got to let
kids just go forward with their
curiosity because we are natural-born
scientists that's how to start
